body_html:
Relevant repro:

In [18]: x = torch.randn(2, 2)

In [19]: x.unsqueeze(-3)
Out[19]:
tensor([[[-0.5044, -0.1367],
         [-1.3774, -0.8027]]])

In [20]: x.unsqueeze(2)
Out[20]:
tensor([[[-0.5044],
         [-0.1367]],

        [[-1.3774],
         [-0.8027]]])

In [21]: x.unsqueeze(3)
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
RuntimeError                              Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-21-0ffc26a7d0d4> in <module>()
----> 1 x.unsqueeze(3)

RuntimeError: dimension out of range (expected to be in range of [-3, 2], but got 3)

body:
Relevant repro:
```
In [18]: x = torch.randn(2, 2)

In [19]: x.unsqueeze(-3)
Out[19]:
tensor([[[-0.5044, -0.1367],
         [-1.3774, -0.8027]]])

In [20]: x.unsqueeze(2)
Out[20]:
tensor([[[-0.5044],
         [-0.1367]],

        [[-1.3774],
         [-0.8027]]])

In [21]: x.unsqueeze(3)
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
RuntimeError                              Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-21-0ffc26a7d0d4> in <module>()
----> 1 x.unsqueeze(3)

RuntimeError: dimension out of range (expected to be in range of [-3, 2], but got 3)

```
